meanings.definition: A subject of conversation or discussion.
meanings.sent1: The topic of today's class is about animals.
meanings.sent2: The students debated the topic of climate change.
meanings.sent3: The topic of the talking parrot was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the hot topic of the evening.
meanings.sent5: The topic of friendship is always important to discuss.

meanings.definition: A specific area of interest or concern.
meanings.sent1: His favorite topic to read about is space exploration.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the topic of improving customer service.
meanings.sent3: The topic of ice cream flavors brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The topic of love can be as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: Exploring new topics can be exciting and educational.

meanings.definition: A matter dealt with in a text or speech.
meanings.sent1: The main topic of the book was the journey of a young hero.
meanings.sent2: The speaker addressed the topic of mental health awareness.
meanings.sent3: The topic of the play was so intriguing that the audience was captivated.
meanings.sent4: The topic of freedom rang through the halls of history.
meanings.sent5: The topic of the speech left a lasting impact on the listeners.
